useCase.name: View Digitization Date of Item
useCase.description: Researcher accesses the digital archive to view the digitization date of a specific item.

preconditions.precondition: Researcher has access to the digital archive system.

successEndConditions.condition: Researcher successfully views the digitization date of the item.

failureEndConditions.condition: Researcher is unable to view the digitization date of the item.

mainSequence.step: Researcher requests to view a specific item.
Search service queries the item metadata.
Search service displays the item details.
Web interface shows item details including digitization date to the Researcher.
